Text:
yes, who is the oranist?
It is very important to always name the performers.

Sorry, I don't exactly know, who organist is, because I've downloaded this records from our network and then shared them with The Pirate Bay. Maybe you can be interested in my other release - http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3568635 - J.S. Bach organ works, plays Lionel Rogg. It's from my home collection.

The organist is Ton Koopman.

Amsterdam Baroque Choir
This release is appeared to be the part of Teldec's Complete Bach Edition: http://www.jsbach.org/variousbach2000thecompletebachedition.html
OMG! Thank you so much!  Bach is undoubtedly the best composer for the organ.  And thank you for finding out who the organist is.  I always like to keep that noted.
TON KOOPMAN IS THE BEST ORGANIST IN THE WORLD.
Well, I don't know about the best.  Personally, I prefer Leonidas Melnikas.
The best organists for Bach were Helmut Walcha and Anton Heiler!

I hate Koopman performance ... :S
My best is Karl Richter but i'm going to try the Helmut Watcha versions ,Cheers upload Bach merit respect :D

Funny that.

I would have said the best Bach organist was either Simon Preston or Kevin Bowyer.
